name: Natura by Dhimant Vyas x Seva.Love

metadata.name: Intimate Affection
metadata.description: As our love blossoms, the spirit starts dancing gracefully creating the divine experience! Watercolor and 24-karat gold foil painting on Arches paper created animated by Dhimant Vyas. 25% of sales from the Natura collection will be donated to Jara to support empowering children in under-resourced and low-internet / low-electricity communities to receive a quality education anytime, anywhere through the Jara Unit. The first buyer of this NFT from natura.seva.love will be sent additional NFTs entitling them to: (1) a virtual master class with Dhimant Vyas, (2) the annual Seva Love summit, (3) a Seva Love Mentor Club token, and (4) two Seva Love Mint Passes. Learn more about the NFT utility and view the terms of sale [here](https://mirror.xyz/sevalove.eth/ShJRDICvi03eJUOUQUfqV_-7vXxM6BXqZA_o7sL8JAI).
